Room.Name: The Gate Before the Tower
Room.Description: The clouds are heavy and dark around this huge, crudely designed rock tower. Shrill cries can be heard far above coming from an unknown source. Before you is a huge silver gate, behind which lies the Dragon Tower. To the west is a dark grove.

Room.Name: The Foyer of the Tower
Room.Description: Dark candles rest in holders on the walls. The foyer of the tower is a decent sized hall as your footsteps echo loudly throughout it. Grand tapestries hang from the walls adorned with fine fabrics from around the world. There are three doors to the north, east and west. To the south is the gate to the tower.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south is a doorway and to the north the hall continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north and south the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south the hallway continues and to the north the hallway ends at two doors.

Room.Name: Hall's end
Room.Description: The air in this room is well insolated. Warm and dry. The walls themselves seem to have been created magically. The doors to your east and west are both made of the strong wood of Arkham while to the south a hall continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west is a door and to the east the hall turns.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and south meet here in a junction that lets you go in either direction.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north you notice the hall forms a turn and to the south there is a split in the hallway.

Room.Name: At a junction
Room.Description: The hallway here connects with another hallway making a three-way junction. The walls are cold to the touch and made of some strange, glass-like material that sends a chill down your spine. To the east a hallway breaks away from the north-south hallway.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north there is a junction and to the south is a turn.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east is a junction and to the west is a door.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west is a junction and to the east is a door.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the east and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south is a junction and to the north the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. The hallway continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north is a junction and to the south the hallway continues.

Room.Name: At a junction
Room.Description: The hallway here connects with another hallway making a three-way junction. The walls are cold to the touch and made of some strange, glass-like material that sends a chill down your spine. To the south a hallway breaks away from the east-west hallway.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east is a junction and to the west the hall ends.

Room.Name: the dead end
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. Abruptly, the hallway comes to an end here, though there is faint scuffing on the floor.

Room.Name: a small tunnel
Room.Description: Dust covers the floor and fills the air in this small and cramped tunnel. Looking up you see that a light shines through from above.

Room.Name: a small tunnel
Room.Description: Dust covers the floor and fills the air in this small and cramped tunnel. The dropping of water can be heard off in the distance which begins to slowly tear away at your mind. The silence... The water...

Room.Name: a small tunnel's end
Room.Description: The dust in this end of the tunnel is a little less frequent than it is off to the east. The dropping of water is much louder here and your mind races with ways to escape this madness. To the east the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. The hallway continues to the north and west while to the east is a door.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west is a junction in the hallway while to the east the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west and east the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west and east the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west the hallway continues and to the east there is a junction in the hallway.

Room.Name: At a junction
Room.Description: Two hallways connect here, making a three-way junction. The walls are made of a strange, glass-like material that is cold to the touch and sends a chill down your spine. To the west a hallway breaks away to the north while to the south there is a tunnel.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard from a general southern direction. To the north there is a junction in the tunnel.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard from a general southern direction.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard from a general southern direction. The tunnel makes a turn here to the east where it meets with a stairway.

Room.Name: an ice-covered Stairway
Room.Description: The tunnel here comes to an end as it connects to a stairway leading into the depths of the Tower. An ice-covered railing leading down helps with the stairs so you do not slip, although since it is covered with ice as well, you wonder how much aid it would give.

Room.Name: an ice-covered Stairway
Room.Description: Ice covers everything around you and the chilly air bites at your skin. It seems the further down you go, the colder it gets. An ice-covered railing follows the steps up and down with you, but you wonder how much aid it would provide since it is frozen, as well.

Room.Name: an ice-covered Stairway
Room.Description: The tunnel here comes to an end as it connects to a stairway leading up into the Tower. An ice-covered railing leading up helps with the stairs so you do not slip, although since it is covered with ice as well, you wonder how much aid it would give.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard to the east of here, while to the west you see a stairway.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard to the east of here.

Room.Name: an ice-covered tunnel
Room.Description: The walls in this tunnel are strangely covered in ice. Fog covers the floor making it difficult to see where your feet are. Loud cries and shreaks can be heard directly east of here. It looks as though the tunnel opens up into a cave, the lair of some beast.

Room.Name: The Ice-Covered Cave
Room.Description: Ice covers everything in this room. The high ceiling reaches almost into the heavens as you stare in awe at the intricate murals and sculptures chiseled into the ice. The cold air in this room makes it perfect home to the large and ancient white dragon.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south there is a junction in the hallway, while to the north the hallway makes a turn.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the east and south meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway continues while to the west it makes a turn.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway makes a turn and to the west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and south meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north the hallway turns west, while to the south it continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north hallway continues, while to the south it turns west.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: A stairway
Room.Description: A cold drip can be heard off in a corner somewhere as you notice how dark and lonely this small corner of the Tower is. Some type of diamond material has been carved and placed in a way that you can climb up them like stairs. To the east is a hallway.

Room.Name: Top of a stairway
Room.Description: Strange shimmering scales cover the walls at the top of this stairway. A railing resembling the tail of some huge dragon beast follows the stairs down below. To the west the hallway follows to a turn.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east there is a stairway and to the west is a turn in the hallway.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the east and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north there is a junction in the hallway and to the south it turns.

Room.Name: At a junction
Room.Description: Two hallways connect here, making a three-way junction. The walls are made of a strange, glass-like material that is cold to the touch and sends a chill down your spine. To the south a hallway breaks away to the east and west hallways.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway meets a junction and to the west it continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway continues while to the west is a stairway.

Room.Name: the bottom of a stairway
Room.Description: This stairway is very hot and humid in a way that is very uncomfortable. The steps themselves look as though they were melted from the rock instead of having been carved. A hallway is to the east and you can go up the steps.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very warm to the touch. A stairway has been cut from the floor and leads down into darkness, while to the east the warm temperature seems to rise.

Room.Name: A hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very hot to the touch. Fierce and shrill cries can be heard coming from a dark cave to the north, as does a thick stream of smoke, while to the west the hallway comes to an end.

Room.Name: The Flaming Cave
Room.Description: This large room before you is much, much hotter than the previous few rooms you've had to endure. Flames spill forth from holes in the ground and you notice in the corner of the cave a large pile of scorched bones.

ExtraDescription.Description: Human, elven, dwarven... Even bones of giants rest in this large pile. One thing you can't help to think is the horror that they must have had to put put up with before they finally became the dragon's lunch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway makes a turn while to the east it continues.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and south meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north the hallway makes a turn while to the south it continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north and south the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north and south the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south you notice the hallway has stopped, but continues to the north. The floor here has some strange scratches on it.

Room.Name: a Long, Dark Ladder
Room.Description: This ladder looks as black as midnight, and twice as mysterious. It almost seems to shift into and out of reality, melting into the shadows at times making it increasingly difficult to climb. You notice it continues down into the darkness and up towards an exit.

Room.Name: a Long, Dark Ladder
Room.Description: This ladder looks as black as midnight, and twice as mysterious. It almost seems to shift into and out of reality, melting into the shadows at times making it increasingly difficult to climb. You notice it continues down into the darkness and up towards an exit.

Room.Name: a dark tunnel
Room.Description: The lack of torches or lanterns in this small tunnel merely impairs your vision, as your eyes soon adjust to the darkness. On the far wall there is a ladder made of a strange material that leads up towards the rest of the tower. To the south you hear strange noises coming from a dark cave.

Room.Name: The Dark Cave
Room.Description: As with the tunnel leading into this cave, the darkness here is quite overwhelming. Seemingly the home of every shadow and shape available, the darkness toys with your mind. You seem to float in and out of consciousness and lose sense of what is real and what isn't. It is very obvious that this cave is one of magical construct, and the creator must have been quite a mage.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north, west, and south are iron-bound doors, all with strange, draconian symbols on them.

Room.Name: the Royal Quarters
Room.Description: Ancient draconian paintings, framed in sculpted dwarven iron adorn the walls of this grand bedroom. A very large bed glowing of wealth and power sits in the middle of the room, it's canopy long and glamorous. Jewels and rare gems rest atop a bedstand that is in the far corner of this room. A large, dark- elven rug, woven of the finest silk covers most of the floor. To the south is an iron-bound door.

Room.Name: The Guest Room
Room.Description: This is the standard draconian guest room. One bed, one dresser, a decent sized mirror covers the east wall. Various semi-valuable paintings hang here and there on the walls. The only strange thing is that this certain guest seems to be quite a mage, having spent hours of deep meditation and concentration, he has opened a portal in the west wall. You wonder if it is a temporary portal for while the mage stays here, or if he has taken up residence in the Tower and will be here indefinately.

Room.Name: The Guest Room
Room.Description: This is the standard draconian guest room. One bed, one dresser, a decent sized mirror covers the east wall. Various semi-valuable paintings hang here and there on the walls. The only strange thing is that this certain guest seems to be a dark and deadly assassin. Knives and daggers rest in pools of dried blood and poison. You wonder if it was a good idea to come here when you glance around the various instruments he uses in killing.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: At a junction
Room.Description: Two hallways connect here, making a three-way junction. The walls are made of a strange, glass-like material that is cold to the touch and sends a chill down your spine. To the north a hallway breaks away to the east and west hallways.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues while to the south is an iron-bound door.

Room.Name: The Guest Room
Room.Description: This is the standard draconian guest room. One bed, one dresser, a decent sized mirror covers the east wall. Various semi-valuable paintings hang here and there on the walls. The only strange thing is that this certain guest isn't what you'd expect to find in a place like this; a Ranger of the forests. Books of peace and the forests clutter the floor, as do many various plants from all around Orthos. You wonder why such a man would be visiting this tower.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east it looks like the hallway ends and to the west it continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. A heavy, black iron trapdoor sits tightly against the stone floor.

Room.Name: the dark corridor
Room.Description: Around the corner to the east comes a loud growl, almost shaking pieces of the acid pitted walls to the floor. The smell of a nauseating sulfuric gas hangs heavy in the air. The floor, like the cold, dark walls around you is pitted in many places as well. Above, you see a heavy, black iron trapdoor leading up into the rest of the Tower.

Room.Name: the dark corridor
Room.Description: In a southern direction comes a loud growl, almost shaking pieces of the acid pitted walls to the floor. The smell of a nauseating sulfuric gas hangs heavy in the air. The floor, like the cold, dark walls around you is pitted in many places as well.

Room.Name: the dark corridor
Room.Description: In a southern direction comes a loud growl, almost shaking pieces of the acid pitted walls to the floor. The smell of a nauseating sulfuric gas hangs heavy in the air. The floor, like the cold, dark walls around you is pitted in many places as well.

Room.Name: the dark corridor
Room.Description: In a western direction comes a loud growl, almost shaking pieces of the acid pitted walls to the floor. The smell of a nauseating sulfuric gas hangs heavy in the air. The floor, like the cold, dark walls around you is pitted in many places as well. The corridor opens up to the west of here, leading into a large cave of some sort.

Room.Name: The Acid Pools
Room.Description: The power of the fumes from the pools is so thick and nauseating that you almost turn back. Acid pours from holes in the walls and fills the pools, which in turn flow into a small stream of acid that follows around the floor. The walls of this large cave seem to have been protected somehow, because they seem almost pristine in their dark nature.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north you notice a large and glamorous stairway.

Room.Name: the Large Stairway
Room.Description: Marvelous jewels, gems and dragonscales adorn the bannister of an ivory carved railing that follows the steps up to the next floor. The smell of a fine smelling dinner wafts in from above, making your mouth tingle with a need to taste.

Room.Name: the Large Stairway
Room.Description: Marvelous jewels, gems and dragonscales adorn the bannister of an ivory carved railing that follows the steps down to the next floor. The smell of a fine smelling dinner wafts in from around you, making your mouth tingle with a need to taste. You also notice a long table, extended full length through this large hall leading north a bit and extended west.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impression that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the northwest you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the north you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the northeast you see the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the northeast you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the east you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the east you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: The Throne
Room.Description: Great scales of ancient dragons adorned with jewels of the finest quality form the enormous throne before you. Cushioned with pillows so that the king is more comfortable, it radiates high quality. From this particular part of the room, you can see why the king's negotiating skills are to be reckoned with. The throne is raised a bit higher than the rest of the chairs, giving the king a strategic look of great importance.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impressing that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the west you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: Around the Dining Table
Room.Description: As you progress around this very large table, you notice many fine wines and foods, some of which you sample, that originate from around the world. The Draconian King probably hopes this display of wealth will impress any of the visiting guests. You notice all the chairs at this table have been removed, giving you the impression that it is more like a buffet table, rather than a fancy dining room. To the west you notice the King's throne.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the south you see what looks to be the back of a throne. To the north you notice a large stairway.

Room.Name: the Large Stairway
Room.Description: Just as the strange glass-like material are of the walls, so is it of the stairs that lead up, towards the very heights of the tower. A loud screech pierces the air and sends a shiver down your spine. Following the long climb up, you notice a dragonscale railing disappearing above you with the stairs.

Room.Name: the Stairs
Room.Description: Just as the strange glass-like material are of the walls, so is it of the stairs that lead up, towards the very heights of the tower. A loud screech pierces the air and sends a shiver down your spine. Following the long climb up, you notice a dragonscale railing disappearing above you with the stairs.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. A dragonscale railing comes up out of a hole in the floor formed by the stairs that have been cut there.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway continues while to the west the hallway seems to cloud with a strange gas.

Room.Name: The cloudy hallway
Room.Description: The hallway becomes increasingly difficult to breathe in as a thick, noxious gas floats in from the cave to the west. Your eyes burn as you stand here, contemplating what to do next. The walls here glow with a strange, dark, ethereal brilliance. To the east the clouds of gas clear up and to the west is a large cave.

Room.Name: the Smoke-filled Cave
Room.Description: Clouds of poisonous gas fill this enormous cave. Breathing in this cave is very difficult, as your mind is plagued with pain and headaches. The cave itself was carved out of the same stone as the tower and the gas here seems to keep any scratches or disruptions in the wall from being permanent. To the east the clouds of smoke are a little less dense.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues while in the far corner you notice a ladder which leads up.

Room.Name: the base of the High Tower
Room.Description: Immediately you sense you are in a hall of great importance. Glowing rocks frame grand paintings of large dragons hang on the north and south walls, while to the west you see the base of this enormous tower extends. The room shakes a bit as you hear loud stomping and crashing coming from far above. You notice there is a ladder leading down.

Room.Name: the base of the High Tower
Room.Description: Immediately you sense you are in a hall of great importance. Glowing rocks frame grand paintings of large dragons hang on the north and south walls, while to the east you see the base of this enormous tower extends. The room shakes a bit as you hear loud stomping and crashing coming from far above. You notice there is a ladder leading up.

Room.Name: the bone-filled hallway
Room.Description: Bones, picked clean of the flesh, blood, and any other things that used to cover them. Stacked high and haphazardly, many fall and land near your feet. The smell of the flesh and dried blood, unfortunately, was not removed. The smell is repulsing and gives you a deep sense of doom to come. Whatever beast could have made these... things it's dinner, is quite dangerous indeed. You also notice a ladder leading down.

Room.Name: the bone-filled hallway
Room.Description: Bones, picked clean of the flesh, blood, and any other things that used to cover them. Stacked high and haphazardly, many fall and land near your feet. The smell of the flesh and dried blood, unfortunately, was not removed. The smell is repulsing and gives you a deep sense of doom to come. Whatever beast could have made these... things it's dinner, is quite dangerous indeed.

Room.Name: the bone-filled Chamber
Room.Description: This chamber, like the hallway to the south has many bones, picked clean of the flesh, blood, and any other things that used to cover them. Stacked high and haphazardly, many fall and land near your feet. The smell of the flesh and dried blood, unfortunately, was not removed. The smell is repulsing and gives you a deep sense of doom to come. Whatever beast could have made these... things it's dinner, is quite dangerous indeed. To the north there is a large, strange looking gate.

Room.Name: the Lair of Tiamat
Room.Description: Dark storm clouds can be seen about here since the roof of this grand lair has been removed. The lair of Tiamat is truely extraordinary. From this height you can see all of the Shadow Grove below you, making you dizzy from it's strange randomness. Lightning crackles and strikes the side of the tower shaking it and knocking a few bones loose of a pile in the corner. The lair itself seems to have been flown up here, rather than built or carved from stone, since it's make up is truely magical in nature. The walls themselves vibrate with strange energy around you, filling your soul with a strange feeling.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east and west the hallway continues.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway turns while to the west it continues.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the east and south meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west the hallway turns a bit and you see a ladder that leads down. Looking down, you notice that it looks a bit longer than you'd prefer.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway continues and you see a ladder that leads up. Looking up, you notice that it looks a bit longer than you'd prefer.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the east the hallway turns and to the west down the hallway you notice a ladder leading up.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the west and south meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: Torches adorn the walls in ornate holders that sparkle with rare gems and stones. The hallways from the east and north meet here in a junction that let's you go in both directions.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west the hallway turns and to the east down the hallway you notice a ladder leading up.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the west the hallway continues and you see a ladder that leads up. Looking up, you notice that it looks a bit longer than you'd prefer.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north the hallway continues and you see a ladder that leads down. Looking down, you notice that it looks a bit longer than you'd prefer.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north the hallway continues, while to the south you notice a ladder leading down.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north you see the roof has been torn from the hallway and a dark storm outside surrounds the tower.

Room.Name: the hallway
Room.Description: A low rumbling can be heard through this hallway from an unknown direction. The walls are made of a strange glass-like material, yet very cold to the touch. To the north you see the roof has been torn from the hallway, as well as a chamber a bit further north.

Room.Name: the torn hallway
Room.Description: The wind picks up as you enter this loud and chaotic hallway. Dust and rain fly wildly through the air, burning your skin. It is difficult to see, but you get the feeling that somehow a storm was brought here and made to stay, raging and tearing at this tower and you, it's only enemy.

Room.Name: the Lightning Chamber
Room.Description: Without a roof, this chamber becomes a perfect home for a dragon. The fact that a permanent storm has been transfered here, throwing lightning, rain and other articles crashing around the chamber another story. A flash of a bright lightning bathes the room in a blue light, almost making you forget the storm itself. The wind shakes the roofless tower violently, making you hope that the magic that built it holds out.

NPC.name: young dragon small
NPC.description: He is a decent sized dragon, around 20 feet in height/length. You can't exactly make out what type of dragon he is, because his spots are not like any you have seen before. He spurts a little fire from his nose, yawns, and stretches out before you.
NPC.longDescription: A small, spotted dragon lies here, looking at you through lazy eyes.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared ProtectionGood Flying

NPC.name: draconian guard
NPC.description: His muscles ripple as he clenches his sword tightly, barring passage to those who wish to hurt the dragons. He has sworn to protect them and that he has done so far. Long black hair flows down past his shoulders, knotting in places and stuck together with dried blood in others. One thing you gather is that he will protect the Towers with his life.
NPC.longDescription: A tall draconian figure stands here guarding the gate.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared ProtectionGood Flying DetectIllusion

NPC.name: royal draconian guard
NPC.description: He looks as though he has been through many years of training and servitude to the tower. His long face seems to give way to his dark eyes and hair, making his somewhat pale complextion distort the contours of his face.
NPC.longDescription: A tall draconian dressed in fine clothing searches the area for intruders.
NPC.affectedBy: ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: guardian dragon pain
NPC.description: He is Huge indeed. He is the Guardian of the 5-Headed Dragon, Tiamat. He rests atop a large pile of bones, picked clean of flesh, and is ready to attack any who enter his Lady's sanctuary. He is greyish in color and large claws give you the impression that he is both fearless, as well as powerful in mind and spirit.
NPC.longDescription: A huge dragon rests atop a pile of bones, destroying those who defy his lady.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood Flying Haste

NPC.name: Tiamat dragon
NPC.description: She is the power behind this very large tower. The oldest among the dragons and probably the strangest looking, she gained power through cheating, treachery, lies and murder. Of course, the five heads, each with a distinct difference, give her alot of her strength, as well. None of the draconian guardians know how or why with Tiamat. Only that she now controls them..
NPC.longDescription: An enormous five-headed dragon stands here, each of it's heads hissing.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Aggressive
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood Flying Haste

NPC.name: draconian king
NPC.description: His very personality shines with a ruling order. His small black eyes with a yellow slit down the middle of each glare down at you. He looks around the banquet table and picks a few delicacies which he promptly devours, and lifts his head toward you. In a big grin he shows you a mouth full of razor sharp fangs.
NPC.longDescription: The Draconian King sits here at the table, glowing with royalty.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dragon ancient green
NPC.description: This dragon seems to be angry at someone.. or something. The unfortunate part is that you have decided to enter this lair and the dragon now forces all it's bottled up anger out at you. It's green dragonscales shimmer in the dim light of the cavern and his dark red eyes glare down at you.
NPC.longDescription: A large dragon with shimmering green scales turns to you in anger.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste

NPC.name: red dragon ancient
NPC.description: It's very large body seems almost demonic in nature. When it stretches it's huge frame to it's fullest, the dark lair seems too small for such a beast. It's bloodshot eyes hold a dark rage that seems spawn of the Dark Gods and it spits fire at any who oppose it.
NPC.longDescription: A huge red dragon paces around his lair, hungry for blood and meat.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste

NPC.name: white dragon ancient
NPC.description: It's shimmering dragonscales are a bright white and it radiates a cold that gives a false impression of joy and peace. Note: False impression. This large beast is neither joyful or peaceful. It is angry that you have disturbed it's icy sleep.
NPC.longDescription: A brightly shimmering white dragon sits here, contemplating your life.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste

NPC.name: blue dragon ancient
NPC.description: It's bright blue scales shimmer with electrical energy while it's huge body becomes an enormous current of power. He gazes at you in anger and rage for defiling his sacred lair, leaving no alternative than to destroy you. It is one of the larger dragons in the tower, almost tall enough to hit it's head on the rock ceiling.
NPC.longDescription: An Ancient Blue Dragons rests here, small sparks sizzle from his body.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste

NPC.name: black dragon ancient
NPC.description: It's great black scales are large and look pitted from years of acid spittle. The great beast smashes it's large talons into the wall, clawing at the rock in an ancient sharpening technique. He then turns his gaze to you and snarls at you, preparing to show you another sharpening technique.
NPC.longDescription: A great black dragon is standing here, defending it's home from visitors.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Haste

NPC.name: shadow dark dragon
NPC.description: It is one of the darkest beasts you have ever seen. The actual size of it alone shows it to be one that is aligned with not only darkness, but the surroundings, as well. It's seems almost like a cross-breed of a black dragon and a green dragon, seeing how it can spit both acid and a poisonous gas.
NPC.longDescription: A very shifty-eyed dragon is resting in the shadows here, awaiting victims.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Hide Flying Haste

NPC.name: demon dark assassin
NPC.description: One of the few surviving demons that were summoned long ago by a dark mage, this demon sells his services to the Great Lords of the realm in return for magical feed, as well as gold. Lots of gold.
NPC.longDescription: A dark-looking demon howls in anger at your intrusion!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Undead Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Flying Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: draconian commoner
NPC.longDescription: A tall, non-descript draconian walks by here.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: draconian queen
NPC.description: She is the beloved wife of the Draconian King. She mostly stays in her room, though, in fear of ruining any of her husband's precious negotiations. The jewels that dangle from her neck and wrist are of the finest quality, as it appears only royalty could afford them.
NPC.longDescription: A tall, beautiful draconian is here, jewels glittering from her large frame.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: mage human
NPC.description: He spends day and night casting spells of binding power, trying to keep the portal he opened from collapsing. Long brown hair flows to his shoulders in a well-kept fashion, and fine silk clothes adorn his body. He tells you how much of a "guest" he is to the draconians. He was one of the few mages that's power was great enough to help re-build the entire tower. The draconians of course treat him almost as royalty, at the cost of his freedom. He will never leave and never live.
NPC.longDescription: A tall human rests on his bed here, tired from magical exhaustion.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ranger human
NPC.description: Having read many books on peace, this man seems quite capable of settling any arguement the draconians raise. You piece together from what he says that he is a representative of the forests of Orthos. Due to many a draconian killing many trees and wildlife, he has chosen to work out a deal with the king in hopes of saving the forest.
NPC.longDescription: A tall ranger sits cross-legged in the corner, contemplating his life.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: draconian fool
NPC.description: Quit the fool, dancing around in circles and juggling some balls high in the air. Smiling toothily, he does a backflip and jumps around, hoping that his attempt to entertain you didn't fail.
NPC.longDescription: A strangely dressed draconian dances foolishly here.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: phase dragon
NPC.description: Multi-colored, yet almost clear. These strange dragons flutter around you growling and chasing it's tail. It breaths a bit of fire on it's tail and whimpers loudly, forcing a small chuckle out of you.
NPC.longDescription: A phase dragon shifts in and out of reality here.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared Flying PassDoor Haste

NPC.name: small white dragon
NPC.description: Quite a small dragon indeed, standing only 18 feet in height he fits easily in this large corridor designed for dragons. Bright white dragonscales cover his body and reflect the light beautifully.
NPC.longDescription: A small white dragon is here blasting ice on the walls.
NPC.affectedBy: Infrared Flying PassDoor Haste

Item.Name: talon chipped
Item.LongDescription: A small, chipped talon is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is in decent condition considering the circumstances. It looks as though it was chipped in battle.

Item.Name: bracer strong iron
Item.LongDescription: A small iron bracer rests here.

Item.Name: black iron longsword sword
Item.LongDescription: A dark piece of iron has been forged into a longsword.

Item.Name: spiral dragon ring
Item.LongDescription: A small dragon spirals around in the shape of the ring.

Item.Name: ornate plate dragon draconian
Item.LongDescription: An ornately designed piece of dragonplate is here.

Item.Name: ornate dragon draconian plates leg legplates
Item.LongDescription: Some ornately designed legplates are here.

Item.Name: ornate dragon draconian plates arm armplates
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of ornate dragon armplates
Item.LongDescription: A pair of ornately designed armplates are here.

Item.Name: royal claw
Item.LongDescription: A very finely crafted claw is here.

Item.Name: potion shimmering
Item.LongDescription: A strange looking potion shimmers here with power.

Item.Name: shimmering key small
Item.LongDescription: A small key is here.

Item.Name: hide protection silver
Item.LongDescription: A strong, tough-looking, silver hide is here.

Item.Name: scales tiamat
Item.LongDescription: A large pile of beautiful scales sit here, glinting.

Item.Name: talisman heads five-headed
Item.LongDescription: A talisman is here with five dragon heads protruding from it, hissing.

ExtraDescription.Description: The heads are of five different dragons, each screaming as if being trapped inside the talisman by some magical force.

Item.Name: bracelet influence draconian
Item.LongDescription: A small bracelet made of dragon bones, emitting raw power, is here.

Item.Name: claw tiamat
Item.LongDescription: A huge, very sharp claw of the great five-headed dragon, Tiamat, is here.

Item.Name: platinum signet ring
Item.LongDescription: A small platinum ring is here, bearing a diamond studded signet.

Item.Name: crown dragon black scales
Item.ShortDescription: the Great Crown of dragon scales
Item.LongDescription: Some dark scales have been hammered into a crown here.

Item.Name: scorched black robe fire
Item.LongDescription: A black robe that has been scorched by some fire is here.

Item.Name: flame mace
Item.ShortDescription: a huge mace named 'Flame of the Tower'
Item.LongDescription: A flaming mace is here, glowing with a strange magic.

Item.Name: skull bloody head green
Item.ShortDescription: the bloody skull of the Green Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A bloody, severed skull of the Green Dragon is here.

Item.Name: gloves green dragon
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of green dragonskin gloves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of green dragonskin gloves are here, bleeding strangely.

Item.Name: red dragon ribcage rib cage
Item.ShortDescription: the ribcage of the Red Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A large ribcage of some enormous beast is here steaming.

Item.Name: sleeves dark red dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark red sleeves emitting horror and rage are here.

Item.Name: girdle white dragon frozen freezing
Item.ShortDescription: the freezing girdle of the White Dragon
Item.LongDescription: The frozen bones of the White Dragon are here in the form of a girdle.

Item.Name: orb dragon dragonkind
Item.LongDescription: A small, strange-looking Orb is here, humming intensively.

ExtraDescription.Description: It hums loudly when you touch the outer surface. The orb is cold to the touch, yet is warm, as well. Feelings of passiveness and aggression mingle as peace, harmony, love, rage, destruction, darkness, light and balance all flow within you.

Item.Name: bracelet frost ice
Item.LongDescription: A small wrist bone seems to have been encased in ice here.

Item.Name: blue dragon talon
Item.ShortDescription: the talon of the Blue Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A sharp talon of the Ancient Blue Dragon is here.

Item.Name: blue leggings legs scales dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the scaled Leggings of the Blue Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of scales from the Ancient Blue Dragon are here in the form of legs.

Item.Name: hide black dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the Hide of the Ancient Black Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A hide of a black dragon is here.

Item.Name: claws black dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the Claws of the Black Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark claws of a huge beast are here.

Item.Name: talons black dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the Talons of the Black Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A pair of dark talons of a huge beast are here.

Item.Name: hide shadow dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the Hide of the Shadow Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A dark hide is sitting here in the corner of the room.

Item.Name: claw dark dragon
Item.LongDescription: A dark and deadly looking claw rests here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum NoRemove VisDeath Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: belt tongues grotesque
Item.LongDescription: A pile of hideous tongues sit in the corner.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Magic NoDrop Bless AntiGood NoRemove

Item.Name: knife demon-headed demonic
Item.LongDescription: A strange-looking knife is here, evil oozing from it.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Evil Magic NoDrop Bless AntiGood NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: The knife looks to be extremely evil, radiating a red aura and almost enveloping the surrounding good. A strange humming can be heard as you hold it.

Item.Name: diamond necklace beautiful
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful diamond necklace is here.

Item.Name: bracelet chain gold gold-chained
Item.LongDescription: A piece of chain is here, wrapped exclusively in gold.

Item.Name: fine collar
Item.LongDescription: A fine-looking collar is here.

Item.Name: white wizard robe magic
Item.LongDescription: A powerful looking white robe is here, glowing with magical energy.

Item.Name: symbol greater magic
Item.LongDescription: A strange symbol glows on the floor.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic NoDrop Bless NoRemove

Item.Name: spiked staff wood glades
Item.LongDescription: A long, spiked staff is here.

Item.Name: wooden bracers warrior forest
Item.LongDescription: A pair of wooden bracers are here, reminding you of the forest.

Item.Name: boots forest walk
Item.LongDescription: A pair of light cloth boots sit here in the corner.

Item.Name: vine bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A small piece of vine has been wrapped into a bracelet here.

Item.Name: juggling balls
Item.LongDescription: A small pile of juggling balls sit here.

Item.Name: jester hat
Item.LongDescription: A large, floppy hat with bright colors and a ball attached is here.

Item.Name: scroll
Item.LongDescription: A slightly unraveled scroll is here, moving with the breeze.

ExtraDescription.Description: Dear Kinsdragon, How is life serving the great Lady of Magic? Surely not as interesting as guarding a hidden hoard within the Tower of the Dragons. I brag this day because I have done a perfectly evil thing, and nobody ever comes around to visit and hear of my evil deeds. Recently a mage wandered in, one not devoted to any of the gods nor goddess, and saw the ancient tome I guard, the Ancient Grimoire of the True Dragons. It is, of course, written in the tongue of our people. This mage seemed to have some knowledge of our tongue, for he read through some of it, got an excited look on his face, and asked me politely if he could translate it for his own use, leaving me the original. He amused me, Shadows, so I let him live and work in the safety of my wing and breath. All who entered were toasted or roasted, and sometimes we ate well although if his own kind ended up dead on the floor he did not dine with me. When he finished his copy of the Ancient Grimoire of the True Dragons, I asked to see his translation. It was a very good rendering of the Old Tongue. Suffice it to say, translator mages are very delicious. Wish you had been here to share the victuals. I trust the elf-Lady keeps you well-fed? Deep-Shadow Tower of the Dragons P.S.--Send the messenger who bears this scroll to visit our kinsdragon Garna. He stole a trinket of mine when he thought I wasn't looking, the fool. Garna will return it if she values her life after enjoying elf-meat.
You look at the writing on the scroll. It appears to be a letter.

Item.Name: grimoire dragons translation
Item.ShortDescription: translation of the Ancient Grimoire of the True Dragons
Item.LongDescription: A small book is on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is all I managed to translate from ancient texts found while searching for a way to enhance our magic to such strength that it would defy spellbane utterly, as well as counter some of the twisted magics used by the killers who call themselves Ancient. I had heard a rumor in childhood which led me to believe the dragons of old had the answer, so I wandered the Tower and found this ancient tome within the greedy grasp of an evil shadow dragon. The dragon was kind enough to let me stay and translate. This is my translation copy, which I will probably share with draconian mages, as I know it will feed upon some of their desires. REVERSION MAGIC: Spell to undo the process of turning dragon into part-hominid/part-dragon (called by commoners draconians). The spell requires various reagents in specific quantities. To revert a draconian to dragon form it is *absolutely necessary* to gain 10 scales of a true dragon the same color as the draconian to be reverted. In addition, various colors of draconians will require different reagents to revert them to the right color true dragon. Failure to use the proper reagent will result in the draconian being exploded, its soul so decimated it cannot re-congeal into another mortal shell. For a red draconian, a bit of fire is required. Best results have come from the use of a ring of fire. A green draconian's reversion will require something poisonous. In the margin of the original Grimoire were words penned in somewhat slanted: 'hydrocyanic acid' (?) A blue draconian requires the aid of nature's electricity. A very powerful implement which sets off a chain reaction of lightning bolts works best for the blue. Mere single bolts from lesser wands have caused the premature death of the blue desiring reversion. The reversion of a white draconian requires something powerful which sucks in the heat of the Light, leaving Shadow and coldness. In the margin words penned at a slant read: 'ring of ice' (?) Black draconians require something that eats away at metals. Very powerful acids are to be found in the world but are well-guarded. Slaves have lost their lives in retrieval of such things as hydro- fluoric acid. IN ADDITION to the scales and special reagents, the draconian requesting the reversion needs a specially brewed reagent. It is said that only the Lady's chosen among the great learned ArchMages of the world are capable of creating such brews. Not everything an ArchMage brews will work, however. Experience has shown that these items when brewed serve best for the reversion spell: Harp of Dragonsong Ring of Dragons Dragon Crest signet ring Ring of the Diamond Dragon They must be brewed under specific circumstances, also. One very important requirement often skimped upon (and if not done this way, the whole reversion spell turns into an annihilation of the draconian wishing reversion), is that the ArchMage must brew the object within the view of the powerful one who will work the reversion magic. While successful reversions have occurred under the watchful eyes of a mortal mage, more often than not the mortal has not the strength needed to command the magical weave. If a god would watch over the reversion, it has a better chance of succeeding. Dragon magic being very powerful, it is advised that weak gods, no matter how evil, not be asked to oversee the process. They have been known to ruin the entire thing and leave the draconian crippled or worse, because they are not powerful enough to weave the magic necessary to work with the draconic reagents. It is said that long ago Elminster once wove the magic for a reversion, and barely succeeded. The resulting true dragon had scales that would not polish to a fine lustre, and his breath did not proceed from his maw beyond the length of an average gnome, thus limiting him to 'in-your- face' combat. His wings were also mangled, making him aerodynamically unsound and therefore landbound. Succeed in mixing all these necessary ingredients in a cauldron of obsidian, and have all the powerful magics necessary nearby, and the reversion spell should not fail.

Item.Name: dragonscale scale red
Item.LongDescription: You see a large red scale glowing with heat.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Magic RotDeath VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to have once been a part of the natural body armor of the Ancient Red Dragon. Its red glow is warmth, a residual from the nature of the original owner.

Item.Name: dragonscale scale green
Item.LongDescription: You see a large green scale, from which a wispy green mist rises.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil Magic RotDeath VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to have once been part of the natural body armor of the Ancient Green Dragon. The wispy green mist which rises from it is noxious, reminiscent of poison.

Item.Name: dragonscale scale blue
Item.LongDescription: A huge blue scale on the ground emits tiny sparks.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Magic RotDeath VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to have once been part of the natural body armor of the Ancient Blue Dragon. >From the sparks which it emits, you know that it could be shocking to touch it.

Item.Name: dragonscale scale white
Item.LongDescription: An ice-encrusted white scale is here, sucking in the heat around it.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil Magic RotDeath VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: It is very cold to the touch, as though it were itself made of ice. Once a part of the natural armor of the Ancient White Dragon, it seeks heat from its current surroundings.

Item.Name: dragonscale scale black
Item.LongDescription: A large black scale is here, oozing acid.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil Magic RotDeath VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to have been at one time part of the natural armor of the Ancient Black Dragon. Now it oozes a liquid which appears to be very harmful to metals.

Item.Name: etched pendant
Item.LongDescription: You see a pendant deeply etched by what appears to have been dragon breath.

Item.Name: hammer pendant
Item.LongDescription: You see a pendant with a large black hammer engraved upon it.
